Text: Excellent package, although you've missed a few. I'll uplaod "The Early Year Vol. 1 & 2" in a few...
Yeah thanks Yrgal, the Early Years Sets I didn't have so I'll be downloading those from you. Thanks. Do you have anything else?
I've got the 4 CD bootleg "Scarecrows & Hummingbirds" where 17 of the tracks are not available on his regular albums. I'll make a torrent later.

Hey naxoking

Thanks for all your trouble. I have been waiting for this a long time. Its downloading now and I hope I can download yr torrent completely. (seems to stop ;-) 

But again: thanks so much....
thanks Yrgal. Lookin forward to that

Aah, nice one. But a few of bootlegs regarded as his best are missing AFAIK, "Cold Beer on a Hot Night" (Sydney -79) and "At the Circus" (Sthlm -99) are both AA+ in performance, sound quality and crowd. PM me if you want them up here, otherwise they're at dimeadozen.org
looking for a live bootleg. called ;drink at the bar'  Do you have any clues?

Thank you very much, been a huge fan of Mr. Waits since I was 15, glad to be able to fill in the holes of his many works I don't actually have.

-Cpt. Orleck

Great work!
Tales from the Underground I haven't heard before, it was really great, as promised. Cheers!

Thanks a bunch for this. All-in-all, your collection of offerings has yielded some wonderful pieces toward the restoral of my stolen collection! Addtional thanks for that!!!  Also YRGAL am waiting for the Scarecrows and Hummingbird downloads you promised and the Early Years you said you have ;-D  Naxo, any idea how you can search for a person's collection by name? Is there a way to search for individual posters???
